channel.title: When i log on
channel.description:
When i log on to my server, for the first time when i run it, all kinds of things are missing, like, npc bodys (so theres floating parts of them), walls, fountains, etc.
Is there a way to fix this??
--Life[br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2007, 06:05:11 PM[/size][hr]Also, how do i reduce lag?? Theres a TON of it on my server. Explain plz.

item.title: When i log on

item.title: When i log on
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

nah, tried, its something that like, everything doesnt load fast enough, i dont know… is it because my client.java is way to big? lol[br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2007, 06:25:36 PM[/size][hr]and should i delete all those retarded commands i dont use, like the ones that say for example:

“f17”

“char14”

“int6”

and shizz like that??

I dont really want it to continue…

item.title: When i log on
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Also, how do i reduce lag?? Theres a TON of it on my server. Explain plz.
scroll over your client.java and tell me how big the file is...Delete extra objects, npcs, commands etc that you dont need or use.

Read full topic
